member.name: T:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.AcademicCredit
member.summary: Credits earned by a student, shown in student's AcademicHistory

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.AcademicCredit.Id
member.summary: The ID of this academic credit

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.AcademicCredit.CourseId
member.summary: Id of the course related to this academic credit. (May be blank)

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.AcademicCredit.StudentId
member.summary: Student Id for credit. Needed for reference back to student.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.AcademicCredit.SectionId
member.summary: Id of the course section the student was registered for. (May be blank)

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.AcademicCredit.CourseName
member.summary: CourseName represents the course name at the time the student took the course (HIST*101)

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.AcademicCredit.Title
member.summary: Title represents the course title at the time the student took it. Could be different than course, but can also be blank. (Intro to Math)

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.AcademicCredit.VerifiedGradeId
member.summary: Id of the grade item for this academic credit. (May be blank)

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.AcademicCredit.VerifiedGradeTimestamp
member.summary: DateTime of last verified grade change

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.AcademicCredit.Credit
member.summary: Credit is the "enrolled" credits (STC.CRED)

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.AcademicCredit.GpaCredit
member.summary: GPA credit is the sum of the GPA credits (STC.GPA.CRED) used in GPA calculation of the term GPAs.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.AcademicCredit.GradePoints
member.summary: GradePoints awarded based on verified grade.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.AcademicCredit.CompletedCredit
member.summary: Credits counts as completed.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.AcademicCredit.ContinuingEducationUnits
member.summary: Continuing Education Units

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.AcademicCredit.Status
member.summary: Status can be New, Add, Dropped, Withdrawn, Deleted, Cancelled, TransferOrNonCourse, Preliminary, Unknown

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.AcademicCredit.StatusDate
member.summary: The Date that the current status was assigned

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.AcademicCredit.TermCode
member.summary: Term in which the credit was taken

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.AcademicCredit.MidTermGrades
member.summary: Midterm grades for this academic credit

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.AcademicCredit.GradingType
member.summary: Denotes whether the associated section Id was taken for a grade, pass/fail, or audit. Default is graded.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.AcademicCredit.SectionNumber
member.summary: Section Number

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.AcademicCredit.HasVerifiedGrade
member.summary: Indicates whether there is a verified grade, even if the verified grade is suppressed due to a grade viewing restriction.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.AcademicCredit.AdjustedCredit
member.summary: The final adjusted completed credits when there is a verified grade.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.AcademicCredit.IsNonCourse
member.summary: Indicates whether this credit was granted based on a non-course equivalency

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.AcademicCredit.StartDate
member.summary: Start Date for this Academic Credit

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.AcademicCredit.EndDate
member.summary: End Date for this Academic Credit

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.AcademicCredit.IsCompletedCredit
member.summary: Initialize Method
Indicates whether this credit is to be considered complete.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.AcademicCredit.ReplacedStatus
member.summary: Indicates whether this credit has been replaced or will possibly be replaced

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.AcademicCredit.ReplacementStatus
member.summary: Indicates whether this credit is a replacement for another credit, or will possibly be a replacement in the future

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.AcademicCredit.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor for the AcademicCredit transfer object

member.summary: Indicates whether this credit is considered a completed academic credit. Completed credits are indicated when there is a verified grade or it's a transfer/noncourse or there is no grade scheme and the end date has passed.

member.summary: The final adjusted GPA credits when there is a verified grade. Needed for when the student has completed the course but the GPA falls below a requirement minimum.

member.name: T:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.CourseSearchCriteria
member.summary: Contains INCOMING course search/filter request Search criteria can be 1 of the following 4 items: a Keyword, a RequirementGroup, a Requisite, or Course Ids. Once the search is performed the other attributes of this DTO are used to filter the results. All other attributes may be optionally used to filter the results of the search.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.CourseSearchCriteria.#ctor
member.summary: Default parameter-less constructor

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.CourseSearchCriteria.Keyword
member.summary: Course search second determines if there is a search keyword provided and no search sujects. If there is a keyword provided, the search will be performed for that keyword.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.CourseSearchCriteria.CourseIds
member.summary: Require If Keyword or SubjectSearch are not provided, course search will determine if specific course Ids have been provided. If so it will perform the search based on the course Ids provided.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.CourseSearchCriteria.RequirementGroup
member.summary: If keyword or course ID are not provided, the course search will determine if there is a RequirementGroup and, if so, will perform the search for courses based on the specific requirement code, subrequirement Id and group Id provided in the RequirementGroup. A RequirementGroup must contain all 3 components: a RequirementCode, a SubRequirementId and a GroupID.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.CourseSearchCriteria.RequirementCode
member.summary: If no keyword, course Ids, or requirement group, the course search will determine if there is a requirement code. If so, course search will perform a search using this requirement code and will return a filtered list of all courses meeting any of the subrequirement groups within this requirement. If requirement code is not provided either, the full catalog of courses is used and the filters will be applied to that.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.CourseSearchCriteria.Subjects
member.summary: Subject Filter: Used to filter returned results to specific subjects.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.CourseSearchCriteria.AcademicLevels
member.summary: Academic Level Filter: Used to filter returned results to specific academic Levels.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.CourseSearchCriteria.CourseLevels
member.summary: Course Level Filter: Used to filter returned results to specific course Levels.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.CourseSearchCriteria.DaysOfWeek
member.summary: DaysOfWeek Filter: Used to filter returned results to specific days of the week.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.CourseSearchCriteria.Locations
member.summary: Location Filter: Used to filter returned results to specific location codes.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.CourseSearchCriteria.Faculty
member.summary: Faculty Filter: Used to filter returned results based on specific faculty names.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.CourseSearchCriteria.CourseTypes
member.summary: Course Type Filter: Used to filter returned results based on specific course types.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.CourseSearchCriteria.EarliestTime
member.summary: Earliest Time Filter: Used to filter returned results based on meeting start times.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.CourseSearchCriteria.LatestTime
member.summary: Latest Time Filter: Used to filter returned results based on meeting end times.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.CourseSearchCriteria.StartsAtTime
member.summary: StartsAt Time Filter: Used to filter returned results based on meeting start times on top of EarliestTime.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.CourseSearchCriteria.EndsByTime
member.summary: EndsBy Time Filter: Used to filter returned results based on meeting end times on top of LatestTime.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.CourseSearchCriteria.TopicCodes
member.summary: Course Topic Filter: Used to filter returned results based on course topic codes

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.CourseSearchCriteria.Terms
member.summary: Course Term Filter: Used to filter returned results based on course term codes

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.CourseSearchCriteria.SectionIds
member.summary: If no keyword, course Ids, requirement group or requirement Code is specified, Search will check whether search for Section Ids is requested

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.CourseSearchCriteria.OnlineCategories
member.summary: Online Categories Filter: Indicates whether to filter sections on the basis of online category. The possible values are: Online: Selects sections that have only online instruction NotOnline: Selects sections that have no online instruction Hybrid: Selects sections that have some instruction that is online and some instruction that is not online

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.CourseSearchCriteria.SectionStartDate
member.summary: If provided, it represents the earliest first meeting date for qualifying sections. Any section with a first meeting date earlier than this will not be included. Note: First meeting date may differ from the section start date.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.CourseSearchCriteria.SectionEndDate
member.summary: If provided, this indicates the latest last meeting date for qualifying sections. Any section with an last meeting date that is greater than or equal to this date will not be included.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.CourseSearchCriteria.OpenSections
member.summary: display sections that are open Only - have seats available

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.CourseSearchCriteria.OpenAndWaitlistSections
member.summary: display sections that are open and waitlisted - have seats available

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.CourseSearchCriteria.SearchSubjects
member.summary: Course search first determines if there is a search subject provided. If there is are SearchSubjects, the search will be performed for those search subjects and also by keyword when the keyword has a value. Search by subjects is different than other criteria when only SearchSubjects exist a search is done for those subjects however when SearchSubjects AND the Keyword both have values, two searches will be prefromed (by SearchSubject and also by Keyword)

member.name: T:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.DegreePlans.PlannedCourse
member.summary: A course that has been planned. Planned courses are grouped together by term on a degree plan.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.DegreePlans.PlannedCourse.CourseId
member.summary: Id of the course that is being planned. Required.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.DegreePlans.PlannedCourse.SectionId
member.summary: Id of the section selected.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.DegreePlans.PlannedCourse.TermId
member.summary: Term Id for which the course is planned. If blank this is a "non-term" planned course/section.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.DegreePlans.PlannedCourse.Credits
member.summary: Number of credits planned. If there is only a courseId, then this is the number of credits planned for the course. If there is both a course and a section, then this is effectively the number of credits planned for the section. If empty, then the default credits for the course or section is used. Will be present only where variable credits are allowed.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.DegreePlans.PlannedCourse.Warnings
member.summary: List of validation messages associated with this course/section. May include DegreePlanWarning messages for corequisites unmet or for time conflicts between scheduled sections, for example.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.DegreePlans.PlannedCourse.GradingType
member.summary: Grading Type - only applies to the section. Defaults to Graded if there is no section.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.DegreePlans.PlannedCourse.SectionWaitlistStatus
member.summary: Indicates whether the student is actively on a waitlist for the associated section

member.summary: Contains information that controls the display and processing of faculty grading.

member.summary: Should dropped and withdrawn students be included in the list of students to grade

member.summary: Should students in crosslisted sections be included in the list of students to grade

member.summary: Should grades be immediately verified.

member.summary: List of terms open to faculty grading

member.summary: Number of midterm grades being stored and managed for each class related to faculty grading (0 - 6).

member.summary: When true, limit midterm grading to the allowed grading terms.

member.summary: When true, provide the faculty member with a way to indicate that midterm grades are complete for a section and midterm grade number (one through six.)

member.summary: When true, do not allow midterm grading for a given sectino and midterm grade number (one through six) after the faculty member has indicated that midterm grading is complete.

member.name: T:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.InstantEnrollmentCourseSearchCriteria
member.summary: Contains INCOMING course search/filter request Search Criteria will only work on sections that are valid for Instant Enrollment. If keyword is provided then only keyword will imply to sections for Instant Enrollment and not the whole course catalog. If SectionIds are provided then only those sections will be filtered which intersect with valid sections for Instant Enrollment. Once the search is performed the other attributes of this DTO are used to filter the results. All other attributes may be optionally used to filter the results of the search.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.InstantEnrollmentCourseSearchCriteria.#ctor
member.summary: Default parameter-less constructor

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.InstantEnrollmentCourseSearchCriteria.Keyword
member.summary: Course search first determines if there is a search keyword provided. If there is a keyword provided, the search will be performed for that keyword.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.InstantEnrollmentCourseSearchCriteria.DaysOfWeek
member.summary: DaysOfWeek Filter: Used to filter returned results to specific days of the week.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.InstantEnrollmentCourseSearchCriteria.Locations
member.summary: Location Filter: Used to filter returned results to specific location codes.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.InstantEnrollmentCourseSearchCriteria.Faculty
member.summary: Faculty Filter: Used to filter returned results based on specific faculty names.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.InstantEnrollmentCourseSearchCriteria.EarliestTime
member.summary: Earliest Time Filter: Used to filter returned results based on meeting start times.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.InstantEnrollmentCourseSearchCriteria.LatestTime
member.summary: Latest Time Filter: Used to filter returned results based on meeting end times.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.InstantEnrollmentCourseSearchCriteria.TopicCodes
member.summary: Course Topic Filter: Used to filter returned results based on course topic codes

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.InstantEnrollmentCourseSearchCriteria.Terms
member.summary: Course Term Filter: Used to filter returned results based on course term codes

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.InstantEnrollmentCourseSearchCriteria.SectionIds
member.summary: If keyword is not provided then Search will check whether search for Section Ids is requested. These sections can only be valid sections for Instant Enrollment.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.InstantEnrollmentCourseSearchCriteria.CourseIds
member.summary: If keyword is not provided and section ids are not provided then course search will determine if specific course Ids have been provided. If so it will perform the search based on the course Ids provided.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.InstantEnrollmentCourseSearchCriteria.OnlineCategories
member.summary: Online Categories Filter: Indicates whether to filter sections on the basis of online category. The possible values are: Online: Selects sections that have only online instruction NotOnline: Selects sections that have no online instruction Hybrid: Selects sections that have some instruction that is online and some instruction that is not online

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.InstantEnrollmentCourseSearchCriteria.SectionStartDate
member.summary: If provided, it represents the earliest first meeting date for qualifying sections. Any section with a first meeting date earlier than this will not be included. Note: First meeting date may differ from the section start date.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.InstantEnrollmentCourseSearchCriteria.SectionEndDate
member.summary: If provided, this indicates the latest last meeting date for qualifying sections. Any section with an last meeting date that is greater than or equal to this date will not be included.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.InstantEnrollmentCourseSearchCriteria.Subjects
member.summary: Subject Filter: Used to filter returned results to specific subjects.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.InstantEnrollmentCourseSearchCriteria.Synonyms
member.summary: Synonym Filter: Used to filter returned results to specific Synonyms.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.InstantEnrollmentCourseSearchCriteria.OpenSections
member.summary: display sections that are open Only - have seats available

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.InstantEnrollmentCourseSearchCriteria.OpenAndWaitlistSections
member.summary: display sections that are open and waitlisted - have seats available

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.InstantEnrollment.InstantEnrollmentCashReceiptAcknowledgement.Status
member.summary: The value of EC.PROC.STATUS if an EC.PAY.TRANS record was read. Will be S for success, F for failure or C for canceled. As explained in comments in the routine if EC.PROC.STATUS is not S yet there is a CASH.RCPTS record with data, the CTX will return an "S" in this field. Only returned when a e-commerce transaction id is supplied.

member.summary: Boolean indicates if the student is eligible for registration

member.summary: Boolean indicates if the user has permissions to override and perform registration actions for the student, even if not eligible.

member.summary: Term specific registration eligibility information specific to a student

member.summary: Student registration eligibility information specific to a term

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.RegistrationEligibilityTerm.TermCode
member.summary: Term for which the registration priority information pertains

member.summary: Any messages as a result of term rules

member.summary: Date and time when the student will be authorized to perform "add" type of registration actions

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.RegistrationEligibilityTerm.Status
member.summary: Status of the term's overall eligibility. Indicates whether registration actions are currently available, up coming, in the past or information is missing.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.RegistrationEligibilityTerm.SkipWaitlistAllowed
member.summary: Indicates whether or not this user is allowed to skip the waitlist

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.RegistrationEligibilityTerm.FailedRegistrationPriorities
member.summary: If true it means that the student either has a registration priority for the term and its dates are not currently active, or the term is set up to check for registration priorities but the student does not have one. Otherwise this is false. In either case, the student will be prevented from registering for any section in this term.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.RegistrationEligibilityTerm.FailedRegistrationTermRules
member.summary: If true it means that this term has Term Registration Rules defined and the student either doesn't pass any (as of today) or the student passes a rule but the rule dates are not open as of today. In either case the student will be prevented from registering for any section in this term.

member.summary: Registration actions will be available at some future point in time.

member.summary: All registration periods, action times, are in the past. Too late.

member.name: F:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.RegistrationEligibilityTermStatus.NotEligible
member.summary: A priority registration item could not be found for this student in this term or they are otherwise just not eligible.

member.name: F:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.RegistrationEligibilityTermStatus.HasOverride
member.summary: An override is available for this student in this term.

member.summary: Indicates whether the requisite must be met prior to the course or section, or if it must be met concurrently with the course or section, or whether either timing is acceptable.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.Requisite.CorequisiteCourseId

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.Requisite.IsProtected

member.summary: Possible values indicating when a requisite must be completed in relation to the course.

member.summary: The requisite must be completed at the same time as the item.

member.summary: The requisite must be completed prior to taking the item.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.Section.Capacity
member.summary: Capacity is "global" if section is cross-listed, otherwise it is the section's capacity If null the section has unlimited capacity.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.Section.Available
member.summary: Available is the number of students that can still register for this section. It will be which ever is smaller (global availability or section availability) If Available is 0 then this section is considered closed to new registrations. If Available is null then this section is unlimited.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.Section.WaitlistAvailable
member.summary: If a student is permitted to request being added to the waitlist, this is true. If the section is not active, if the section doesn't allow placement on a waiting list, or if waitlist is closed, this is false.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.Section.IsActive
member.summary: Indicates whether the section is active or not. If canceled this is false.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.Section.Waitlisted
member.summary: Number of students currently active on the waitlist for this section. If the section is cross listed, and waitlists are "combined" for all sections, then it will show the number on the waitlist for all sections.

member.name: T:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.SectionRequisite
member.summary: Requisites related to courses or sections. For example, when taking BIOL-100 you are required to take BIOL-101L concurrently.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.SectionRequisite.CorequisiteSectionIds
member.summary: Optional: Used by sections with corequisite sections. No requirement code will be supplied when corequisite sections are present.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.SectionRequisite.NumberNeeded
member.summary: Optional: For sections with corequisite sections, specifies the number of listed sections needed to satisfy the requisite. This value will be supplied only in conjunction with CorequisiteSectionIds.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.SectionRequisite.IsRequired
member.summary: Indicates whether the requisite is required or just recommended.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.SectionRoster.FacultyIds

member.name: T:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.SectionSearchCriteria
member.summary: Contains INCOMING section search/filter request Search criteria can be 1 of the following: a Keyword or Course Ids or section Ids. Once the search is performed the other attributes of this DTO are used to filter the results. All other attributes may be optionally used to filter the results of the search.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.SectionSearchCriteria.#ctor
member.summary: Default parameter-less constructor

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.SectionSearchCriteria.Keyword
member.summary: Section search first determines if there is a search keyword provided. If there is a keyword provided, the search will be performed for that keyword.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.SectionSearchCriteria.CourseIds
member.summary: If keyword is not provided, search will determine if specific course Ids or section Ids have been provided.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.SectionSearchCriteria.RequirementGroup
member.summary: If keyword or course ID are not provided, the course search will determine if there is a RequirementGroup and, if so, will perform the search for courses based on the specific requirement code, subrequirement Id and group Id provided in the RequirementGroup. A RequirementGroup must contain all 3 components: a RequirementCode, a SubRequirementId and a GroupID.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.SectionSearchCriteria.RequirementCode
member.summary: If no keyword, course Ids, or requirement group, the course search will determine if there is a requirement code. If so, course search will perform a search using this requirement code and will return a filtered list of all courses meeting any of the subrequirement groups within this requirement. If requirement code is not provided either, the full catalog of courses is used and the filters will be applied to that.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.SectionSearchCriteria.Subjects
member.summary: Subject Filter: Used to filter returned results to specific subjects.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.SectionSearchCriteria.DaysOfWeek
member.summary: DaysOfWeek Filter: Used to filter returned results to specific days of the week.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.SectionSearchCriteria.Locations
member.summary: Location Filter: Used to filter returned results to specific location codes.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.SectionSearchCriteria.Faculty
member.summary: Faculty Filter: Used to filter returned results based on specific faculty names.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.SectionSearchCriteria.CourseTypes
member.summary: Course Type Filter: Used to filter returned results based on specific course types.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.SectionSearchCriteria.CourseLevels
member.summary: Course Level Filter: Used to filter returned results based on specific course levels.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.SectionSearchCriteria.AcademicLevels
member.summary: Academic Level Filter: Used to filter returned results based on specific academic levels.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.SectionSearchCriteria.EarliestTime
member.summary: Earliest Time Filter: Used to filter returned results based on meeting start times.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.SectionSearchCriteria.LatestTime
member.summary: Latest Time Filter: Used to filter returned results based on meeting end times.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.SectionSearchCriteria.StartsAtTime
member.summary: StartsAt Time Filter: Used to filter returned results based on meeting start times on top of EarliestTime.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.SectionSearchCriteria.EndsByTime
member.summary: EndsBy Time Filter: Used to filter returned results based on meeting end times on top of LatestTime.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.SectionSearchCriteria.TopicCodes
member.summary: Course Topic Filter: Used to filter returned results based on course topic codes

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.SectionSearchCriteria.Terms
member.summary: Term Filter: Used to filter returned results based on term codes

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.SectionSearchCriteria.SectionIds
member.summary: If keyword is not provided and course Ids are not provided, search will determine if specific section Ids have been provided. If keyword is null or empty and there are no course Ids or section Ids then no sections will be returned.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.SectionSearchCriteria.OnlineCategories
member.summary: Online Categories Filter: Indicates whether to filter sections on the basis of online category. The possible values are: Online: Selects sections that have only online instruction NotOnline: Selects sections that have no online instruction Hybrid: Selects sections that have some instruction that is online and some instruction that is not online

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.SectionSearchCriteria.SectionStartDate
member.summary: If provided, it represents the earliest first meeting date for qualifying sections. Any section with a first meeting date earlier than this will not be included. Note: First meeting date may differ from the section start date.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.SectionSearchCriteria.SectionEndDate
member.summary: If provided, this indicates the latest last meeting date for qualifying sections. Any section with an last meeting date that is greater than or equal to this date will not be included.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.SectionSearchCriteria.OpenSections
member.summary: display sections that are open Only - have seats available

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.SectionSearchCriteria.OpenAndWaitlistSections
member.summary: display sections that are open and waitlisted - have seats available

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.SectionSearchCriteria.SortOn
member.summary: Field to sort on

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.SectionSearchCriteria.SortDirection
member.summary: Sort Direction

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.SectionSearchCriteria.SearchSubjects
member.summary: Course search first determines if there is a search subject provided. If there is are SearchSubjects, the search will be performed for those search subjects and also by keyword when the keyword has a value. Search by subjects is different than other criteria when only SearchSubjects exist a search is done for those subjects however when SearchSubjects AND the Keyword both have values, two searches will be prefromed (by SearchSubject and also by Keyword)

member.name: T:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.SectionSeats

member.summary: Section Id

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.SectionSeats.Guid
member.summary: GUID for the section; not required, but cannot be changed once assigned.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.SectionSeats.NumberOnWaitlist
member.summary: Number of students actively on the waitlist for this specific section This will include active and permitted to register.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.SectionSeats.PermittedToRegisterOnWaitlist
member.summary: Number of students on the waitlist who have been given permission to register. This is used to reduce availability and is a subset of the above NumberOnWaitlist property.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.SectionSeats.ReservedSeats
member.summary: Number of seats being held in reserve by web processes for a particular section.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.SectionSeats.SectionCapacity
member.summary: Capacity set for this specific section. When null there is no limit on seats available.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.SectionSeats.GlobalCapacity
member.summary: Capacity set for all cross listed sections. Null if section is NOT cross listed. NOTE: If the section IS cross listed both the global and the local capacities have to be null for it to be truly unlimited.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.SectionSeats.CombineCrosslistWaitlists
member.summary: Indicates whether cross-listed sections are to operate with effectively 1 waitlist. When true, if a waitlist is started for any section then the waitlist starts for ALL sections. When false, sections with availability will show their availability even if other cross-listed sections are wait-listed.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.SectionSeats.Capacity
member.summary: CALCULATED: If global capacity is not null it will return global capacity, otherwise it returns the section capacity.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.SectionSeats.Available
member.summary: CALCULATED: Number of available slots still available for registration. Null when there is no capacity. For cross-listed sections, this will which ever is less - global available or section available. NOTE: If CombineCrosslistWaitlist is true, and a waitlist exists for any of the cross-listed sections, then available is zero.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.SectionSeats.Waitlisted
member.summary: CALCULATED: This is the number of active people on the waitlist for the section. If the section is cross listed, and if "CombinedCrosslistWaitlist" is true, then the number waitlisted will be the number on any of the cross listed section's waitlists.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.SectionSeats.AvailabilityStatus
member.summary: This indicates status of the section It is Open when there are seats available. It is Waitlisted when there are students in waitlist. It is Closed when there are no seats available.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.SectionSeats.Enrolled
member.summary: CALCULATED: Number of enrolled students for the course section. If there is no global capacity, this is the sum of: all active students + reserved seats + waitlisted students with permission to register If there is a global capacity, this is the sum of: all active students (for the section and any crosslisted sections) + reserved seats (for the section and any crosslisted sections) + waitlisted students with permission to register (for the section and any crosslisted sections)

summary.summary: Flag indicating whether or not the section seat count information is available - this will be false when the Seat Service API is enabled and the call to the External Seat Service API failed

member.name: T:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.StudentProgramStatusProcessingType
member.summary: Defines the various types of optional Graduation Questions

member.name: F:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.StudentProgramStatusProcessingType.None
member.summary: Value is "0" to specify there is no processing thype exist

member.name: F:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.StudentProgramStatusProcessingType.Potential
member.summary: special processing code of 1. The value with the special processing code of 1 is the value that will be assigned to the student program record when the record is created for an application This indicatex that this is a preliminary student program.

member.name: F:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.StudentProgramStatusProcessingType.Active
member.summary: special processing code of 2. The value with the special processing codeof 2 is the value that will be assigned to the student program record when an application is moved to STUDENTS.

member.name: F:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.StudentProgramStatusProcessingType.Graduated
member.summary: special processing code of 3. The value with the special processing code of 3 is the value that will be assigned to the student program record when the record is moved to the person's academic credentials (ACAD.CREDENTIALS file). The special processing code of 3 is also used to designate completion.

member.name: F:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.StudentProgramStatusProcessingType.InActive
member.summary: The special processing code of 3 is also used to designate completion.

member.name: F:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.StudentProgramStatusProcessingType.Withdrawn
member.summary: special processing code of 5. This is the code that will be put on a student's active academic programs when a student withdraws from the institution

member.name: T:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.StudentRegistrationSkipValidationsRequest
member.summary: Request to execute the specified section registration actions without validations. Most validation checks are bypassed, but basic system integrity rules are still enforced. For example the specified student GUID must be an actively enrolled student and a specified section GUID must exist in the database. NOTE: This API assumes that the Seat Service is used to manage section seat reservations and counts and that the caller is updating the seat service separately, but in coordination with this API call.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.StudentRegistrationSkipValidationsRequest.SectionActionRequests
member.summary: List of section registration action requests

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.StudentRegistrationSkipValidationsRequest.ValidationToken
member.summary: Optional token returned by a previous call to the registration validation API. Pass this token with the exact same section registration actions that were sent to the registration validation API, with the exception that any actions that failed with the registration validation API can be included or left out. The system will retrieve information stored with the token, such as overrides used, and store it whenthis API records the actual registrations. Do not pass a token when this call is not associated with a corresponding registration validation API call in the same Colleague instance.That would be the case when cross-registering a visiting student at the delivering school.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.StudentRegistrationSkipValidationsRequest.CrossRegHomeStudent
member.summary: Pass true if cross-registering a home student into sections that will be delivered by a different institution. Otherwise pass false

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.StudentRegistrationSkipValidationsRequest.CrossRegVisitingStudent
member.summary: Pass true if cross-registering a visiting student into sections that this institution delivers Otherwise pass false

member.name: T:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.StudentRegistrationSkipValidationsResponse
member.summary: The response received from a skip validations registration request

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.StudentRegistrationSkipValidationsResponse.Messages
member.summary: A list of registration messages. These messages are designed to be displayed to a person who will interpret them, but are not designed to be consumed by software. Each message may reflect an error or may be only informational or a warning. Each message also may or may not be associated with a section ID. The section ID is not necessarily the ID of a section for which a registration action executed. For instance a drop of a section is requested but fails because it is a required corequisite of another section, the associated message will contain the section ID of the other section.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.StudentRegistrationSkipValidationsResponse.SectionActionResponses
member.summary: List of section action responses, one for each section action that was passed with the request

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.StudentRegistrationSkipValidationsResponse.PaymentControlId
member.summary: The ID of the related registration payment control if applicable.

member.name: T:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.StudentRegistrationValidationOnlyRequest
member.summary: Request to execute the specified proposed section registration actions to validate their success or failure, but not actually record the registrations. NOTE: This API assumes that the Seat Service is used to manage section seat reservations and counts and that the caller is updating the seat service separately, but in coordination with this API call. This API does not validate that a seat is available in the sections for which an add registration is requested.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.StudentRegistrationValidationOnlyRequest.SectionActionRequests
member.summary: List of section registration action requests

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.StudentRegistrationValidationOnlyRequest.RecordValidationDataFlag
member.summary: If true the response will contain a token to stored data from this validation. The token should be passed to a subsequent call to the skip validation registration API for the exact same sections and actions, which will use the data stored by this validation only API. Pass false in this flag if only running the validation with no plan to follow up with a skip validations registration API call.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.StudentRegistrationValidationOnlyRequest.CrossRegHomeStudent
member.summary: Pass true if validating the registration of a student cross-registering into sections that will be delivered by a different institution. Pass false to validate any other registration.

member.name: T:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.StudentRegistrationValidationOnlyResponse
member.summary: The response received from a registration validation request

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.StudentRegistrationValidationOnlyResponse.Messages
member.summary: A list of registration messages. These messages are designed to be displayed to a person who will interpret them, but are not designed to be consumed by software. Each message may reflect an error or may be only informational or a warning. Each message also may or may not be associated with a section ID. The section ID is not necessarily the ID of a section for which a registration action executed. For instance a drop of a section is requested but fails because it is a required corequisite of another section, the associated message will contain the section ID of the other section.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.StudentRegistrationValidationOnlyResponse.SectionActionResponses
member.summary: List of section action responses, one for each section action that was passed with the request

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Student.StudentRegistrationValidationOnlyResponse.ValidationToken
member.summary: If the RecordValidationDataFlag was true in the request, this will contain a token to data stored with the validations. The token should be passed to a subsequent call to the skip validation registration API for the exact same sections and actions, which will use the data stored by this validation only API.
